name: 999- A Mahjong Game
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In university I bought some mahjong cards and realised I had nothing to play

Necessity being the mother of invention I created a little card game for up to 9 players and tried it with fellow students

It seemed popular so I made a PC version as an experiment

You can change the font, card and background graphics through the options menu
Included are Google's Noto Sans fonts and some graphics I created as examples

This was put together over like 2 months and was mainly a project to learn C++ and SDL2

Please enjoy
